name: Tally
story: Born and raised in a poor neighborhood in Warsaw, Tally turned to a life of crime at a young age. He quickly gained a reputation as a ruthless enforcer, feared by both his rivals and his own crew. Tally's weapon of choice is a pump-action shotgun, which he wields with deadly accuracy. He dreams of one day escaping his life of violence and finding redemption, but for now, he remains loyal to his criminal organization.
